title: Top UK and U.S. banks crackdown on cryptocurrencies
text:
Top UK and U.S. banks crackdown on cryptocurrencies 1:17pm GMT - 01:37 
British bank Lloyds has joined U.S. giants JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup in banning their credit card customers from buying cryptocurrencies. Reuters Lawrence White reports on why they're taking the action and what might still be to come.
